oai_dc:dc.dc:title: From conventional to organic farming: aspects to consider
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ponzio, Carlo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Main steps to convert to organic agriculture are described, starting from principles of OA as well as general concepts of sustainability. A simple road map driving the conversion is described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ponzio, Carlo (2011) From conventional to organic farming: aspects to consider. .
